news.text: Paper titled "A Path from Serial Execution to Hybrid Parallelization for Learning HPC" was accepted at %%EduHPC%% (Workshop on Education for High-Performance Computing) held in conjunction with SC 2017.

Talk titled "Parallel Streaming for In Transit Analysis with Heterogeneous Data Layout" was accepted for presentation at the %%ISAV workshop%% (In Situ Infrastructures for Enabling Extreme-scale Analysis and Visualization) held in conjunction with SC 2017.

Paper titled "StickySchedule: An Interactive Multi-user Application for Conference Scheduling on Large-scale Shared Displays" was  presented at %%PerDis 2017%% (ACM International Symposium on Pervasive Displays).

Paper titled "Automated Dynamic Data Redistribution" was presented at %%PDSEC 2017%% (Parallel and Distributed Scientific and Engineering Computing). PDSEC was a workshop held in conjunction with IPDPS (International Parallel & Distributed Processing Symposium).
Paper titled "Mixed Presence Collaboration using Scalable Visualizations in Heterogeneous Display Spaces" was presented at %%CSCW 2017%% (Computer-Supported Cooperative Work & Social Computing).
I appeared as a featured extra in the independent film %%"The Crash"%% by Aram Rappaport. I can be seen next to co-stars Minnie Driver and Frank Grillo around the 25 minute mark.

I accepted a new position of Assistant Professor in the %%Computer and Information Sciences Department at the University of St. Thomas%% in St. Paul, MN. I am set to begin for the 2017-2018 academic year!
